course_description: This course examines patterns of health in place and time, application of geospatial technologies for epidemiology, analysis of time-space relations, clusters and diffusion of disease, and the spatial ecology of selected infectious and non-infectious diseases.
sections: Class Nbr: 2858, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-5p, Instructor: J. Clennon, Status: Open
